attributes.action: allow all MP's to sit independently and vote with conscience and not the whip.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that MP's should be allowed to vote as they wish and not as they are told. This would empower government decentralising some authority from the Prime Minister and Cabinet and give greater responsibility to individual MP's.

If all MP's were allowed this it would ensure policies be more robust and give the electorate greater belief in their local MP and goverment as a whole.
